p: We first used the discrete diffusion model implemented in BEAST 1.8 to undertake a continental-scale phylogeographic analysis of a broad data set of Asian RABV sequences ( S1 Table; see also the Materials and Methods for details). Genetic histories of the RABV N and G genes reveal two individual lineages (YN-A1 and YN-A2, Fig 2) that represent the majority of sampled RABV infections in the post-1999 Yunnan epidemic.
